version_description: - Completely compatible with iPad. Optimization of supported OS versions.
- Lightweight UI, optimization of image size detection.
- Multiple language support
- Bug fixes
- You can save two or more images to camera roll at once.
Added the function to turn off the advertisement display by billing.
Dark mode support.

- Bug fix (do not verify receipt at startup)
- Smooth navigation when jumping to Google image search or folder source URL
Minor bug fixes
Swipe image zoom function

- Swipe upward while displaying an image to delete it
- Fixed a bug where the title image of the folder was not the first image.
Fixed a bug where downloading could not be performed after a certain download error occurred
- Fixed so that page turning works smoothly on full screen image display page.

- Fixed a bug that downloaded images were not recognized at all on iphone5 and 6 (iOS10)
- Fixed a bug that the app falls when saving images to camera roll on iphone5 or 6 (iOS10)
- Added a filter function by folder name to the folder list screen

- Added the function to save browser history
- Display progress of image loading status in thumbnail view
- Display the number of images that match each filter in the thumbnail view

- Fixed a bug that when opening an image in the middle from the thumbnail view on iOS 10 such as iphone 5, it is displayed from the first image
- Fixed that URLs that are not images are excluded from thumbnail view after loading
- Fixed so that folders and images in the app can be referenced from external apps such as the "File" app
- Appearance mode can be changed by the config page

- Change supported OS to iOS 11 or above
- Modified to automatically disappear the notification of download start and end
Fixed a bug that the memory is over when it is operated by a certain amount (memory leak fixed)
Added the function to skip the image list screen and directly display the full screen by long pressing the folder

Added a button to reset the web cache.
Added a setting to automatically reset the cache at startup.

Added the ability to specify the URL to open at startup.
Modified to also delete history when deleting cache and cookie.

- Added the function to select/deselect all images after long-pressed image on the thumbnail screen.
- Check boxes are displayed on the full screen.

- Added the function to check the URL on the full screen screen
- Adjust the position of the check box
- Added a button (dice) to open a folder at random

- Fixed the UI of the number of images corresponding to each filter on the thumbnail screen.
- Fixed the UI showing the number of images in folder.
- Added the function to open the next folder.
- Added the function to open the current URL in Safari.

- Passcodes available.
- The preview from the browser always open in full screen mode.

・Faster retrieval of the folder list.
・The icon on browser page indicating whether you downloaded from the url.
Configurable use of downloaded icons
Added the function to search for large images from the linked pages of images.
Memory leak fix

・Supports SVG images
・Supports animated GIF
・Improved "Dig deep" function

・Optimized folder reading process
・Setting reset function
・Improved folder selection UI

- Fixed a bug that the command menu was still displayed after merging folders.
- Automatic deletion of the download completion dialog can be set.
- It is possible to set whether to use the dice icon.
- digged images are sorted as displayed.

-The behavior of tapping and long tapping on the thumbnail screen can be set.
-It is possible to set whether to open a modal window modally or full screen.
- It is possible to set whether to display the check box on the slide show screen.
- The upper limit of the image display size is 1280px, and images larger than that are resized and handled at the time of display to avoid cases where the image is overloaded and app is dropped.

- Added the function to automatically scroll on the browser screen.
(Execute from the menu displayed when you tap the number indicating the number of image downloads)
・ Addition of ad blocking function
・ Supports Korean and Russian (localized)

- Display a retry dialog when the download fails.
- It is possible to set the delay when downloading.
- Thumbnails are also displayed on the binder.
- Serial number image download function (available only to users with advertising OFF)

- Improved speed and saved memory when displaying a list of folders.
- Fixed the UI to suppress the blue color as a whole. Change the icon.
- Improved UI to move folders to binder.
・ It is possible to immediately determine whether the URL is a serial number from the button.

-The upper limit of the serial number images to be searched can be set.
-Added "Scroll to the end" function (selectable from the menu that taps the number of downloads on the browser screen)

- Reduce the frequency of full-page advertisements.
- Bug reports (email) can be sent from the settings.
- Fixed a bug that the "Review" button in the settings might not work.
- Always turn on the use of binder (also delete from settings)

・ Fine-tune the UI
・ Adjustable automatic scrolling speed

-In the full screen mode (preview screen) of the image, the top and bottom of the screen and the bar are made transparent so that the screen can be used widely.
-The scroll direction on the preview screen can be set.
-Added a function to automate the detection of serial number images
-Fixed a bug that was difficult to see in dark mode

Speed up the search for Dig
It is possible to set an option to automatically search for serial number images at the same time as previewing.

-Fixed that the check to see if it was downloaded was only the top folder, and now it searches everything including the binder.
In addition, it is speeded up by modifying the process to use the search index.
Along with this, the check whether it has been downloaded and the icon display indicating whether it has been downloaded are always turned on.
-Added the "Open last opened page" function in the browser and turned it on by default.

-The thumbnail image screen displays a resized image to reduce processing weight and memory.
-Until now, the modal mode display method could be set from two patterns, Auto (Sheet format) and Fullscreen, but the setting has been abolished and unified to Fullscreen.
-When the advertisement is displayed, the image display area and the banner display area are separated so that the advertisement banner does not come on the image on the slide show screen.
-Fixed a bug that caused the Fukahori function to drop on a specific site.

-Added the function to close the screen by flicking down on the thumbnail screen.
-On the thumbnail screen, replace the trash icon and Info icon to prevent mistakes in pressing and adjust the icon spacing.
-On the thumbnail screen, added the function to convert the selected images to a PDF file (only available to users with Ads OFF)
-It is possible to rename folder / binder from the folder list menu.
-Supports patterns such as 001.jpg, 002.jpg where 0 comes first in serial number image download.

- Fixed a bug so that double-tap zoom in / out on the slideshow screen.
- Added a link to "Recommended apps" on the setting screen.
- Make auto written device name in bug report more detailed.

- desable resizing an image larger than 1280px to 1280px when displaying the image so that the original image is displayed.
- enable to set ON / OFF of making folder index, and default is OFF.

I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the bug of this application.

Since the defect could not be reproduced, the cause could not be completely identified,
but I fixed several points that may be causing the bug.



- Speed up folder list acquisition. (Verified with more than 10,000 folders)
- Although some processing related to the display of downloaded images was performed in the background, this method was abolished and corrected so that it is always processed with the highest priority.
- Fixed to raise the execution priority of the icon on folder list in the background.
- Fixed a bug that the deep dig may be repeated indefinitely.
- The deep dig function (a part of) was always working when the thumbnail preview was displayed, but it has been corrected so that it works only when the deep dig button is pressed.
- Fixed to increase the cache size of the folder from 200 to 600.

-Fixed a bug that the number of images in each folder on the folder list screen was counted one more than it actually was.
-It is possible to sort in the order of "URL" on the thumbnail screen. (Please use the serial number image)
-Fixed to process images in the currently selected sort order when converting to PDF or downloading. (Until now, it was always processed in the order on the Web)
-Added an automatic scroll function on the slide show screen (speed can be changed on the setting)

- Fixed to reduce the frequency of displaying video ads.
- Improved processing of folder list display.

- Removed the restriction that the slide show could not be displayed when the network was turned off.
- Fixed a bug that the dice button on the thumbnail screen was not working.

- Fixed around the in-app banner.
- Fixed so that the dice icon can be set on the file list screen.
- Fixed the behavior of opening randomly so that the elements under the binder are also included as targets.
- Fixed Javascript confirm / alert / prompt functions to work correctly in the app browser.
- Temporary files can be checked and deleted (from the setting screen)
- Korean and Russian support is abolished due to high maintenance costs. (I'm sorry for users of the language.)

I have received various additional requests.
I'm sorry to have kept users waiting.
Once the iCap implementation has settled down, I will start adding functions to this app.
-Fixed memory leak.
